Class OpenIdValidateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.AbstractDelegateController

        • org.jasig.cas.support.openid.web.mvc.OpenIdValidateController

  • @Component(value="openIdValidateController")
public class OpenIdValidateController
extends AbstractServiceValidateController
    An Openid controller that delegates to its own views on service validates.
